mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC) RNUM, GOODS_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CATEGORY1, GOODS_CATEGORY2, GOODS_CPRICE, GOODS_MPRICE, GOODS_DATE FROM GOODS
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET GOODS_NUM = #{IDX}, GOODS_NAME = #{GOODS_NAME}, GOODS_CONTENT = #{GOODS_CONTENT}, GOODS_MPRICE = #{GOODS_MPRICE}, GOODS_CPRICE = #{GOODS_CPRICE}, GOODS_DATE = sysdate, GOODS_CATEGORY1 = #{GOODS_CATEGORY1}, GOODS_CATEGORY2 = #{GOODS_CATEGORY2}, GOODS_HASH = #{GOODS_HASH}, GOODS_IMG_THUM = #{GOODS_IMG_THUM} WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{IDX}
UPDATE GOODS_ATTRIBUTE SET GOODS_STATUS = '1' WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{IDX}

choose.when: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC) RNUM, GOODS_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CATEGORY1, GOODS_CATEGORY2, GOODS_CPRICE, GOODS_MPRICE, GOODS_DATE FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_NUM LIKE (#{keyword}) or GOODS_NAME LIKE (#{keyword}) or GOODS_CATEGORY1 LIKE (#{keyword}) or GOODS_CATEGORY2 LIKE (#{keyword}) ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC
choose.otherwise: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC) RNUM, GOODS_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_CATEGORY1, GOODS_CATEGORY2, GOODS_CPRICE, GOODS_MPRICE, GOODS_DATE FROM GOODS WHERE ${searchType} LIKE (#{keyword}) ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC
